body: You have to try the Baja tacos! The fish is amazing and so fresh, and the sauce is just spicy enough.
title: Best Tacos in town

body: We stopped by close to 9pm for a burrito and a margarita. The margarita was awesome, but the burrito was tough. It seemed like it might've been sitting out for a couple of hours.
title: Burrito was a bit tough

body: This is one of our favorite spots for drinks after work. The patio is generally packed during good weather, so it's best to get there early. And the house tequila better than top shelf stuff elsewhere.
title: Great spot for happy hour

body: The kids love taco Tuesdays! It's the perfect place to avoid cooking - and you can't beat the fact that all the tacos are only 2 bucks a piece.
title: Taco Tuesdays are the bomb

body: Whether you are looking for a spot to start your day or end your day, this is a great spot.
title: The namesake tea is delicious

body: Love the huge selection of teas - can't miss!
title: Tea, tea, tea

body: Having lived and worked in Asia for many years, I can attest to just how good this food is. Very authentic.
title: Best food this side of Hong Kong

body: The servers were walking in slow motion and brought the wrong order - twice!
title: Lousy service

body: Went for the spring rolls, which were good. But I'll be going back for the amazing noodle bowls.
title: Forget the spring rolls - go for the noodles

body: Seriously, is there any better burger in the entire world?!
title: Double Double - Animal Style

body: When they say hot, they really, really, really mean it! Better bring a fire hose with you.
title: Spices that are off the chart

body: Breakfast, lunch or dinner, you can't go wrong here. They are even open late if you want to swing by for dessert.
title: Great find, in a great neighborhood

body: Is it wrong to crave these for breakfast?
title: Try the chocolate and strawberries

body: Fresh, fresh, fresh. Great lunch spot.
title: These guys make it wok!

body: Simply amazing from the cocktails to appetizers to entrees and, of course, the dessert!
title: Always a pleasure!

body: If it's beer that you're after, it's a great place. But eat before you go (or after), cause the food is nothing to write home about.
title: Lots of taps, but skip the food

body: I love stopping in for a quick business lunch on the outdoor patio. Good prices, too.
title: Good lunch menu

body: Mix it up and drop the bread. It's a double double wrapped in crispy lettuce. Grab some extra napkins though, it drips a lot.
title: Try the Double Double - protein style

body: Can't complain about a very consistent joint. Get there early on a Friday though, because it tends to fill up quickly.
title: All around good food
